body:
* New versions 3.27.{0,1,2}, 3.28.0.
* Restore ability to download and compile older versions (no checksums, therefore not preferred) with the addition of a variant (`+fts`) which conflicts with versions <3.26.0, thereby resolving issues with Magellan vulnerability.
* Automatic URL calculations.
title: sqlite: New versions; restore old versions; variant to resolve security issues
